result.markdown:
--- title: "Repositorios de software en GitHub" output: html_document editor_options: chunk_output_type: console execute: echo: false --- A continuación una lista de los repositorios de código de acceso abierto en los que contribuyo. [Usamos el [API de GitHub](https://docs.github.com/en/rest?apiVersion=2022-11-28) para consultar listas de repositorios por usuario y una función sencilla en R para leer los datos de la consulta.]{.aside} ::: {.cell} ::: ## Organización `Red List Ecosystems` red-list-ecosystem/redlistr

Description: redlistr: Tools for the IUCN Red List of Ecosystems and Species

red-list-ecosystem/REMAP

Description: Enabling large-scale ecosystem mapping and assessment

red-list-ecosystem/gee-redlist

Description: Tools for the IUCN Red List of Ecosystems and Species in Google Earth Engine

red-list-ecosystem/typology-map

Description: A global ecosystem typology map

red-list-ecosystem/RLE-xml-db

Description: RLE assessment documentation in xml format

red-list-ecosystem/RLE-publication-list

Description: List of publications related to IUCN Red List of Ecosystem assessments

red-list-ecosystem/rle_indices

Description: Ecosystem indices to support global biodiversity conservation

red-list-ecosystem/typology-web-update-content

Description: Scripts to update typology web content

red-list-ecosystem/RLE-forests-panam-results

Description: IUCN Red List of Ecosystem assessment for the forest macrogroups of the Americas: tables with assessment results

red-list-ecosystem/assessments-map

Description: Map of IUCN Red List of Ecosystem assessments

red-list-ecosystem/RLE-forests-panam-GIS

Description: IUCN Red List of Ecosystems of Temperate and Tropical Forest Macrogroups of the Americas - GIS data and analysis

red-list-ecosystem/RLE-forests-panam-RLIE

Description: IUCN RLR forest Macrogroups of the Americas: Red List Index of Ecosystems

red-list-ecosystem/GEE-IUCN-GET

Description: Indicative distribution maps for Ecosystem Functional Groups - Level 3 of IUCN Global Ecosystem Typology - Earth Engine Code

red-list-ecosystem/RLE-Africa

Description: Code for summarising progress of the IUCN Red List of Ecosystems in Africa

red-list-ecosystem/T6.1-SA-01-VE-01-Cordillera-Merida

Description: RLE assessment of the Tropical Glacier Ecosystem of the Cordillera de Mérida

red-list-ecosystem/RLEpdf

Description: Quarto extension to generate a PDF with (pretty) LaTeX styling for RLE assessments

## Organización `Centre for Ecosystem Sciences` ces-unsw-edu-au/fireveg-db

Description: Fire Ecology Traits for Plants - SQL structure of the database

ces-unsw-edu-au/cesdata

Description: GIS data for analysis at the Centre for Ecosystem Science

ces-unsw-edu-au/fire-veg-aust

Description: Fire Ecology Traits for Plants - Code for managing the database

ces-unsw-edu-au/fireveg-webapp

Description: Fire Ecology Traits for Plants - WebApp

## Repositorios en cuenta personal `jrfep` jrfep/alpine-cruiser

Description: Modelling the distribution of cryogenic ecosystem functional groups

jrfep/assessment-ecosystem-functional-groups

Description: Preliminary global assessment of pressures and protection of Ecosystem Functional Groups

jrfep/australian-alps-climate-change

Description: Assessment of relative severity of environmental degradation in Australian Alps

jrfep/Cardenalito

Description: Análisis de datos espaciales sobre la distribución del Cardenalito en Venezuela

jrfep/CEBA.LEE

Description: Código en R para análisis del Laboratorio de Ecología Espacial del Centro de Estudios Botánicos y Agroforestales del IVIC

jrfep/clima_municipios_Venezuela

Description: Análisis básico de datos climáticos para los municipios de Venezuela

jrfep/dwc-from-bhl

Description: Extract distribution data from BHL pages

jrfep/Ecosystem-profiles-comments

Description: Content and map information for the IUCN Global Ecosystem Typology

jrfep/ecosystems-rwanda-uganda

Description: Exploring ecosystems in Rwanda and Uganda

jrfep/GBIFgaps

Description: GBIF vs range maps: ranking novel occurrences and knowlege gaps in GBIF data

jrfep/GEDB

Description: Global Ecosystems Data Base

jrfep/git-novice

Description: Version Control with Git

jrfep/global-river-ice-dataset-from-Landsat

Description: Python (Google Earth Engine), JavaScript (Google Earth Engine) and R code to extract river ice condition from Landsat satellites, to develop empirical model, and to predict future changes in river ice

jrfep/GS-spatial-data

Description: Spatial covariates used for analysis of species occurrence and abundance in Gran Sabana. Venezuela

jrfep/GS-svocc

Description: Fit single visit occupancy models to data from camera trap and walking transects in the Gran Sabana, Venezuela

jrfep/hypothesisr

Description: Wrapper for the Hypothes.is API

jrfep/jrfep.github.io

Description: José R. Ferrer Paris

jrfep/Machine-Learning-with-tidymodels

Description: This is a remix of the Machine-Learning-in-R workshop. This version of the workshop focuses on the tidymodels framework and its applications.

jrfep/MFT1.2-intertidal-forest

Description: MFT1.2 Intertidal forests and shrublands - preliminary level 4 units. This repository showcases the data of products of a IUCN workshop on the delimitation of global ecosystem subgroups for Mangroves.

jrfep/newnes-swamp-collapse-mining-analysis

Description: Analysis for "Effects of interactions between anthropogenic stressors and recurring perturbations on ecosystem resilience and collapse"

jrfep/ohwhaley

Description: Messages With A Whale-esque Flair

jrfep/poblacion-municipios-venezuela

Description: Análisis básico de datos poblacionales para los municipios de Venezuela

jrfep/PoW

Description: Papilionoidea of the World, code and data

jrfep/r-novice-gapminder

Description: R for Reproducible Scientific Analysis

jrfep/redlistr

Description: redlistr: Tools for the IUCN Red List of Ecosystems and Species

jrfep/RLE-Americas-Forest-Macrogroups

Description: Application of the IUCN Red List of Ecosystems to the forest macrogroups of the Americas
